description: Back Garden (Right Boundary) T1: Horse chestnut tree (closest to house) - Reduce height by 2 - 2.5m back to Holistic crown reduction, lift canopy to 6m above ground level, remove major deadwood height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5m) Reduce to give 3m clearance from flats T3: Horse chestnut tree - Reduce height by 2 - 2.5m back to Holistic crown reduction, lift canopy to 6m above ground level, remove major deadwood height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5m) Reduce to give 3m clearance from flats T4: Horse chestnut tree (next to footpath) - Reduce height by 2 - 2.5m back to Holistic crown reduction, lift canopy to 6m above ground level, remove ivy from main trunk and major deadwood height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5m) Reduce to give 3m clearance from flats Reason for work: General tree maintenance to clear from flats and property More light to garden clearance from buildingT2: Holly hedge - Reduce height by 2m, cut back to be level with footpath height 5m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 5m) Reason better access to garden on garden path Front Garden (Front Boundary) T5: Holly tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump height 7m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mReason for work Causing Damage to wall (Left Boundary) T7: Laburnum tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump height 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0m) Reason: suppressing growth of shrubs
